Description: On VA-207 in the County of Caroline, in the vicinity of the ramp to I-95, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 149 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 141.6 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-64 East in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage
